actions.name: Download
actions.description: At the start of battle, or when switched in, the user targets one other creature on the field. If the targeted creature's DEF stat is higher than its SPDEF, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations. If the targeted creature's DEF stat is lower than its SPDEF Stat, the user raises their ATK stage by +1 for 5 activations.
